TopicTitle: Might it be time to update the scenarios?

Articles.Content: I just went ahead and tried the Mun landing one. Nice clean landing, good takeoff, jettison the surrounding four tanks ... and the lander blows up. That can't be intended...
Yeah. They need to be touched up...
Might not be intended, but it is definitely very kerbal.

I think they'll probably get a lot of attention during beta. Blizzy wrote a couple of custom ones that I downloaded to use as templates for my own, but I've never found time for it (or so many other things :-( ).
